usx.para: When the Lord 2.4: the Lord: Where the Hebrew text has Yahweh, traditionally transliterated as Jehovah, this translation employs Lord with capital letters, following a usage which is widespread in English versions. God made the universe, there were no plants on the earth and no seeds had sprouted, because he had not sent any rain, and there was no one to cultivate the land; That is why The Book of the Lord's Battles speaks of “...the town of Waheb in the area of Suphah, and the valleys; the Arnon River, and the slope of the valleys that extend to the town of Ar and toward the border of Moab.”
